summary: This module implements the standard Z‑axis rotation gate and its controlled counterpart. It defines classes that encapsulate the mathematical description, matrix representation, inversion behavior, and seamless integration of these diagonal phase‑shift operations into Qiskit quantum circuits.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to easily incorporate single‑qubit and two‑qubit Z‑rotations into quantum algorithms, supporting accurate simulation and execution on quantum hardware through a reusable library component.
